thread.section_title: Roger Smith Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Customer Service! Terrific location!
thread.title_full: Great Customer Service! Terrific location! - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: aries422016
title: Great Customer Service! Terrific location!
text: Can't ask for a nicer & more accommodating staff. Electric hotel with many unique rooms that make the experience unique. Love the fresh fruit and ability to grab granola and yogurt at any time too! Perfect location to get anywhere too!
